title: Universal Content Analysis Integration
context:
FEATURE REQUEST: Universal Media Analysis for ALL Telegram shares

EXPANDED REQUIREMENTS:

Universal Media Analysis for ALL Telegram shares:
- URLs: Extract content from any platform (Threads, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, articles, etc.)
- Images: OCR, scene analysis, document extraction  
- Videos: Transcription, scene description, key moments
- Audio: Full transcription with speaker identification
- Documents: Text extraction, summarization, key data points
- Files: Content analysis based on type

Technical Scope:
- Auto-detect content type from Telegram shares
- Route to appropriate analysis engine (web scraping, vision AI, transcription)
- Extract actionable insights and context
- Proper Feed classification with full content understanding
- No manual intervention required

Workflow: Jim shares â†’ Atlas analyzes â†’ Feed populated with rich context â†’ Ready for action

This replaces the narrow Threads-only request with comprehensive content analysis for any media Jim shares through Telegram.
